scripts.debug: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "NODE_INSPECT=--inspect-brk npm run dev:start"
scripts.dev: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:start"
scripts.build: npm run clean && next build ./src && npm run build:server
scripts.lint: tslint --project tsconfig.json && tsc && tslint --project tsconfig.server.json && tsc --project tsconfig.server.json --noEmit && prettier --check **/*.ts
scripts.lint:fix: tslint --fix --project tsconfig.json && tsc && tslint --fix --project tsconfig.server.json && tsc --project tsconfig.server.json --noEmit && prettier --write **/*.ts
scripts.test:api-ci: concurrently --kill-others --success first "NODE_ENV=production npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000/health && npm run test:api"
scripts.test:ui-ci: concurrently --kill-others --success first "NODE_ENV=production npm start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000/health && npm run test:ui"
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test && npm run test:api-ci && npm run test:ui-ci && echo Tests passed!
